Text: How is lifeKevin Always glad to hear from you The last email was funny I hope all is going well for you Give the family a big hug and slobbery kiss for us Bill

Back On LineHey Big Guy Can you believe it I am back on line We finally were able to get through to our server It was something on our end I hope you and your family are enjoying the holidays Please try to contact me I want to here what you are up to Your Tulsa connection Bill
Kevin Love the photograph Sounds like your hanging in there I will try to call you soon Give the family big hugs and slobbery kisses Bill
PicturesKevin Thanks for sending me the pictures That has to be the best paint job I have ever seen I hope all is going well for you Give the family a big hug and slobbery kiss for me Bill
